Regulation Name(s): Digital Pathology Image Viewing and Management Software
Specimen Type(s): Digitized surgical pathology slides prepared from formalin-fixed paraffin embedded (FFPE) tissue
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for aetherSlide web-based software for viewing and managing digital images of scanned FFPE surgical pathology slides using Philips Ultra Fast Scanner and PS27QHDCR monitor.
Indications for Use Summary: Software-only device intended for viewing and managing digital images of scanned surgical pathology slides prepared from formalin-fixed paraffin embedded (FFPE) tissue, aiding pathologists in primary diagnosis; not for frozen section, cytology, or non-FFPE hematopathology specimens.
